secondaries.shortDescription: Score points for: (1pt) unit killed by heavy or grenade during Devastator doctrine, (1pt) unit killed by Assault or Rapid F. on tactical doctrine, (1pt) unit killed by pistol or melee in assault doctrine

subObjectives.description: Unit killed by HEAVY or GRENADE during the Devastator Doctrine
Unit killed by ASSAULT or RAPID F. during the Tactical Doctrine
Unit killed by MELEE or PISTOL during the Assault Doctrine

secondaries.shortDescription: Score 3 pts if you took and objective from an enemy this round

subObjectives.description: You control an objective that was controlled by the enemy at the start of the battle round

secondaries.shortDescription: Get points for doing with Adeptos Astartus: (1pts) kill VEHICLE, CHAR, MONSTER, (1pt) No fail morale and no fall back, (2pts) 1 unit wholly within 6" form center

subObjectives.description: Killed VEHICLE, CHAR or MONSTER with Adeptos Astartus unit
No failed morale and no fall back with Adeptos Astartus unit
One Adeptos Astartus unit wholly within 6" from center
